SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM INQRY I INNER JOIN INQRY_CTGRY ICT ON I.CTGRY_NUM = ICT.CTGRY_NUM INNER JOIN INDVDL_CLNT ICL ON I.CLNT_NUM = ICL.CLNT_NUM LEFT OUTER JOIN EMP E ON I.EMP_NUM = E.EMP_NUM WHERE 1 = 1
AND I.WRTNG_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%'
AND ICL.CLNT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%'

SELECT I.INQRY_NUM, ICT.CTGRY_NAME, I.WRTNG_TITLE, I.WRTNG_CONT, ICL.CLNT_NAME, I.ATT_FILE FROM INQRY I INNER JOIN INQRY_CTGRY ICT ON I.CTGRY_NUM = ICT.CTGRY_NUM INNER JOIN INDVDL_CLNT ICL ON I.CLNT_NUM = ICL.CLNT_NUM WHERE I.INQRY_NUM = #{no}
